title: Analysis end date — aendt
text: Derives analysis end date based (incomplete) dates given character

title: Analysis end date — aendt
text: .self data.frame Input data set dtc character Name date variable

title: Analysis end date — aendt
code: x <- pharmaversesdtm::ae |>    dplyr::select(USUBJID, AEENDTC) |>    aendt("AEENDTC")  print(x) #> # A tibble: 1,191 × 4 #>    USUBJID     AEENDTC    AENDT      AENDTF #>    <chr>       <chr>      <date>     <chr>  #>  1 01-701-1015 NA         NA         NA     #>  2 01-701-1015 NA         NA         NA     #>  3 01-701-1015 2014-01-11 2014-01-11 NA     #>  4 01-701-1023 NA         NA         NA     #>  5 01-701-1023 2012-08-30 2012-08-30 NA     #>  6 01-701-1023 NA         NA         NA     #>  7 01-701-1023 2012-08-30 2012-08-30 NA     #>  8 01-701-1028 NA         NA         NA     #>  9 01-701-1028 NA         NA         NA     #> 10 01-701-1034 NA         NA         NA     #> # ℹ 1,181 more rows  x |>    dplyr::filter(!is.na(AENDTF)) |>    print() #> # A tibble: 0 × 4 #> # ℹ 4 variables: USUBJID <chr>, AEENDTC <chr>, AENDT <date>, AENDTF <chr>

what: Dummy node creating a Albumin grouping variable — dummy
title: Dummy node creating a Albumin grouping variable — dummy
text: Based baseline readings (ABLFL == "Y") Albumin (PARAMCD == "ALB") new grouping variable (ALBBLGRP) added following intervals: Albumin levels least 40 g/L: ">= 40 g/L" Albumin levels 40 g/L: "< 40 g/L" Missing baseline levels: "Missing"

Predecessor — predecessor
text: Creates new column(s) based predecessor column(s).

title: Predecessor — predecessor
text: .self data.frame Input data set source data.frame Data set predecessor variable character Name variable(s) use source character name variables merge

title: Predecessor — predecessor
code: pharmaverseadam::advs |>   dplyr::select(USUBJID, PARAMCD, AVAL) |>   predecessor(source = pharmaverseadam::adsl, variable = "ACTARM") #> # A tibble: 65,032 × 4 #>    USUBJID     PARAMCD  AVAL ACTARM  #>    <chr>       <chr>   <dbl> <chr>   #>  1 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9 Placebo #>  2 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9 Placebo #>  3 01-701-1015 BMI      25.1 Placebo #>  4 01-701-1015 BMI      25.1 Placebo #>  5 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5 Placebo #>  6 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5 Placebo #>  7 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9 Placebo #>  8 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9 Placebo #>  9 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5 Placebo #> 10 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5 Placebo #> # ℹ 65,022 more rows  pharmaverseadam::advs |>   dplyr::select(USUBJID, PARAMCD, AVAL) |>   predecessor(source = pharmaverseadam::adsl, variable = c("AGE", "AGEU")) #> # A tibble: 65,032 × 5 #>    USUBJID     PARAMCD  AVAL   AGE AGEU  #>    <chr>       <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr> #>  1 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9    63 YEARS #>  2 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9    63 YEARS #>  3 01-701-1015 BMI      25.1    63 YEARS #>  4 01-701-1015 BMI      25.1    63 YEARS #>  5 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5    63 YEARS #>  6 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5    63 YEARS #>  7 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9    63 YEARS #>  8 01-701-1015 BMI      24.9    63 YEARS #>  9 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5    63 YEARS #> 10 01-701-1015 BMI      24.5    63 YEARS #> # ℹ 65,022 more rows
